aka: Beplaying: The Voices Behind the Sound
this_title: Beplaying: La voz detrás del sonido
trans_title: Beplaying: The Voices Behind the Sound
introduction: This docuseries explores the unseen side of the world’s top DJs. Their life on stage has made them international celebrities, but what goes on when they’re not in front of thousands of dancing fans? Each episode is an inside look at how these artists got to where they are. They'll share their creative processes and sources of inspiration, as well as give a glimpse into their personal lives. Hernán Cattáneo, Nervo, Afrojack, Armin van Buuren, Richie Hawtin, and Carl Cox open the doors to their studios, homes, family, and private lives like never before.1. Armin van Buuren2. Nervo3. Hernán Cattáneo4. Afrojack5. Richie Hawtin aka Plastikman6. Carl Cox
chinese_title: Beplaying: La voz detrás del sonido
